law.catch_line: Violation of quarantine and concealing diseased animals prohibited.
law.text: No person shall willfully obstruct, evade or disregard any quarantine which the board declares, or violate any regulation for the prevention of the spread of communicable diseases among livestock, poultry, and fish, or conceal or attempt to conceal an animal infected with or exposed to a communicable disease.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 5, effective June 25, 2009. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 63c-5.
